sn34.3:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo hoti, na samadhismim vutthanakusalo.
sn34.3:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim vutthanakusalo hoti, na samadhismim samadhikusalo.
sn34.3:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi neva samadhismim samadhikusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim vutthanakusalo.
sn34.3:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo ca hoti, samadhismim vutthanakusalo ca.
sn34.3:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo ca hoti samadhismim vutthanakusalo ca ayam imesam catunnam jhayinam aggo ca settho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
